definition: the mental faculty or power of vocal communication
details:
noun
- the mental faculty or power of vocal communication
= example: the mental faculty or power of vocal communication
= synonyms: speech
- the cognitive processes involved in producing and understanding linguistic communication
= example: the cognitive processes involved in producing and understanding linguistic communication
= synonyms: linguistic process
- a systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds or conventional symbols
= example: a systematic means of communicating by the use of sounds or conventional symbols
= synonyms: linguistic communication
- a system of words used to name things in a particular discipline
= synonyms: terminology, nomenclature
- the text of a popular song or musical-comedy number
= synonyms: lyric
- (language) communication by word of mouth
= synonyms: speech, speech communication, spoken communication, spoken language, oral communication
